summary: Comprehensive frontend testing completed for Ã–H Wirtschaft website redesign. All core functionality verified including loader, navigation, all 5 pages, 404 handling, mobile responsiveness, and light theme implementation. Website is fully functional with excellent user experience.
passed_tests: Page loader appears and disappears correctly (~2.2 seconds)
Light theme with white background (rgb(255,255,255)) - no dark text issues
Navigation bar with all 5 links (Home, Team, Studium, Services, Ceteris Paribus) + Kontakt button
Home page: hero section, 4 quick links cards, about section with stats, study programs (Bachelor & Master), CTA section
Team page: 'Dein Team' title, Maximilian Pilsner highlight card, 13+ team member cards, join CTA with 7 benefits
Studium page: 4 program categories (Bachelor/Master/MBA/ULG), 3 brochure links, 11+ study update accordions with expand/collapse
Services page: Sprechstunden booking link, all 5 calendar import links (Apple/Google/Outlook/Yahoo/Office365), WhatsApp community info, 13+ FAQ accordions
Magazine page: Ceteris Paribus title, 2 edition links (DE/EN), contribution cards (Wer/Was/Wie), Dateien & Rechte sections, 3 timeline entries with submit form
404 page works correctly at /some-nonexistent-page with German text and home navigation
Client-side routing between all pages without full page reloads
Mobile hamburger menu on small viewport (375px width) with all navigation links and auto-close
Footer with all navigation links, email, Instagram, LinkedIn, oeh.jku.at contacts
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
University accent colors correctly implemented: Blue (#0294cb) and Yellow (#f3aa1f)
